documentText:
POWER PURCHASE AGREEMENT

This Power Purchase Agreement ('PPA') is entered into as of February 1, 2024.

PARTIES:

Seller: SolarDev LLC ('Producer')
Address: 456 Energy Drive, Houston, Texas 77001

Buyer: Austin Energy ('Offtaker')
Address: 721 Barton Springs Road, Austin, Texas 78704

PROJECT DETAILS:

Facility Name: Travis County Solar Farm
Facility Location: Travis County, Texas
Nameplate Capacity: 100 MW DC / 80 MW AC
Commercial Operation Date: January 1, 2026 (Projected)

TERM:

Delivery Term: Twenty (20) years from Commercial Operation Date

PRICING:

Contract Price: $0.035 per kWh
Annual Escalation: 1.5% per year
Time-of-Delivery Multipliers:
  - Peak Hours (2PM-7PM): 1.25x
  - Off-Peak Hours: 1.0x

ENERGY DELIVERY:

Expected Annual Generation: 200,000 MWh
Minimum Annual Delivery: 180,000 MWh (90% of expected)
Excess Generation: Purchased at 80% of Contract Price

POINT OF DELIVERY:

ERCOT Node: HB_NORTH
Interconnection: 345kV transmission line

CURTAILMENT:

Buyer Curtailment: Buyer pays 100% of Contract Price for curtailed energy
Grid Curtailment: Force Majeure, no compensation

PERFORMANCE GUARANTEES:

Capacity Factor: Minimum 22% annual average
Availability: Minimum 97%

DAMAGES:

Delay Damages: $50,000 per day after guaranteed COD (max 90 days)
Performance Shortfall: Pro-rata reduction in capacity payments

TERMINATION:

Buyer may terminate for extended Force Majeure (>180 days)
Seller may terminate for non-payment (>90 days overdue)

GOVERNING LAW:

State of Texas, ERCOT protocols applicable

SIGNATURES:

_______________________
SolarDev LLC
By: Jane Doe, Managing Member

_______________________
Austin Energy
By: Robert Johnson, Director of Power Supply

expectedClassification.reasoning: Document is clearly a Power Purchase Agreement with buyer/seller parties, energy pricing, delivery terms, and performance guarantees
